ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Digest Number 1351
ygData.msgSnippet: But I managed to get enough time at Dog Capt on Saturday to hit 53 :) (sigh I leave 52 with neither scale and without Selo s Drums) Elfson Allegro 53
ygData.messageBody:
<sinp>
But I managed to get enough time at Dog Capt on Saturday to hit 53 :)
(sigh
I leave 52 with neither scale and without Selo's Drums)

Elfson Allegro 53 Veeshan
(once again the free range bard for hire)
<snip>

Don't feel alone, I'm 55 with no Selo's drum and no scales. I know another
high level bard who got his Selo's from one of the Kunark dragons, so all
hope is not lost. I have a 44 wizard who will be giving the scales a shot as
opportunities present themselves.

Shada, it's always sad when a bard of such experience lays down the lute!
I've relied on your advice and experience for a long time!

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
